section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas reported:We knew the finishing of the prayer of the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) through takbir. 'Amr (b. Dinar) said: I made a mention of it to Abu Mas'ud. hue he rejected it and said: I never narrated it to you. 'Amr said: He did narrate it before this
